document_data.name: El'lahana Raikeil
document_data.mainbody: '''El'lahana Raikeil''' was a legendary [[elven]] castle found deep within the [[Moonwood]] in [[Luruar]].<ref name="PaP-p39" >
document_data.History: The castle once housed the ''[[Crown of Joy and Tears]]'' which was experimented on by the [[Knights of the Unicorn]]. The Knights returned the Crown to where they found it upon their departure from the castle.
document_data.Defenses: El'lahana Raikeil was filled with riddles and puzzles. Upon solving one of these obstacles, an observer would witness the image of a silver [[unicorn]] that would solidify a little bit more with each riddle solved.
